markdownRemark.html: Located 5 km from Marbella, this resort has a 18-hole golf course. The Rio Real Golf Hotel has a tennis court, terrace, restaurant and wellness center with a variety of treatments, such as massages, facials and wraps. There is free shuttle service to the beach during the months of July and August. Designed by Spain's number one architect, Javier Arana, Río Real opened in 1965 and follows a wide incline down towards the sea. Otherwise the course is flat. With wonderful views, well-established trees that offer much appreciated shade, and the River Real intersecting the course at various points golf here is a very pleasant experience.

frontmatter.title: Golf Río Real

frontmatter.address: Urb. Golf Rio Real, 29603 Marbella, Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 100.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 100.00 euros
